mapper.insert: INSERT INTO OZZY.DIARY (USER_SEQ, DIARY_DATE, ADD_EMOTION_SEQ, EMOTION_CARD_SEQ, TITLE, CONTENT, CREATE_AT, UPDATE_AT) VALUES (#{userSeq}, #{diaryDate}, #{addEmotionSeq}, #{emotionCardSeq}, #{title}, #{content}, sysdate, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT USER_SEQ, DIARY_DATE, TITLE, CONTENT, ADD_EMOTION_SEQ, EMOTION_CARD_SEQ, CREATE_AT, UPDATE_AT FROM OZZY.DIARY WHERE USER_SEQ = #{userSeq} AND TRUNC(DIARY_DATE) = TRUNC(#{diaryDate})
mapper.update: UPDATE OZZY.DIARY SET TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content}, ADD_EMOTION_SEQ = #{addEmotionSeq}, EMOTION_CARD_SEQ = #{emotionCardSeq}, UPDATE_AT = sysdate WHERE USER_SEQ = #{userSeq} AND TRUNC(DIARY_DATE) = TRUNC(#{diaryDate})
